biography_text: TRAHAN, Lori, a Representative from Massachusetts; born in Lowell, Middlesex County, Mass., October 27, 1973; graduated from Lowell High School, Lowell, Mass., 1991; B.S., Georgetown University, Washington, D.C., 1995; attended Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 2013; businesswoman; staff, United States Representative Marty Meehan of Massachusetts, 1995-2005; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
